author: lpernie
body:
Hello @mmusich ,
this is the PR concerning the addition of general tracks to the ALCARECO stream for muon alignment we proposed some times ago.
I took the changes from the latest PR:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9957
If I understand correctly everything was fine at the time, and a "lite" version of general tracks was added to the stream correctly, but just for matter of deadline the changes were never pushed into cmssw.
title: Adding (a lite version of) General Tracks to ALCARECO stream for Muon Alignment
